Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: The purpose of the Pew Research Center is to collect and analyze data from around the world. They explore a variety of topics such as politics, social media, news, economics, online privacy, religion, and demographic trends. They engage in nonpartisan, nonpartisan research and analysis while making their raw data available to the public. Simply register on the site to access the data. When using the data, you need to indicate that the data comes from the Pew Research Center and state that Pew is not responsible for other data conclusions.
